title: Best 66 Instant Pot Recipes - Easy Pressure Cooker Recipes
description: Spoiler alert: It can even make cheesecake.
body: <style type="text/css">#sidepanel{transform:translateX(0);visibility:visible;content-visibility:auto;}@media (max-width:425px){#sidepanel{width:7rem;max-width:7rem;}#sidepanel .nav-item,#sidepanel .nav-item a,#sidepanel footer a,#sidepanel div a,#sidepanel a span{font-size:10px;}#sidepanel ul,#sidepanel div{padding:0;margin:0;}#sidepanel button{display:none;}}</style>SearchMy RecipesSubscribeMembership BenefitsRecipesMealsHolidaysFood TrendsNewsKitchen Tips & ToolsAll VideosAbout UsNewsletterDelish ShopFollowOther EditionsYour Privacy ChoicesPrivacy NoticeTerms Of UseSkip to ContentRecipesDinnersSpring RecipesKitchen TipsNewsSubscribesign inSearchLemon Blueberry DessertsSpring SaladsCopycat Recipe IdeasBrunch RecipesSpring DinnersMeals & CookingRecipe Headquarters66 Instant Pot Recipes That Prove It Can Cook (Almost) Everything66 Instant Pot Recipes That Prove It Can Cook (Almost) EverythingSpoiler alert: It can even make cheesecake. By Mackenzie FilsonUpdated: May 10, 2024Save ArticlePHOTO: RACHEL VANNI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONHere at Delish, we are big fans (huge!) of small appliances‚Äîwe admit to cooking more than our fair share of meals in our air fryers, slow cookers, toaster ovens, and more. One of our favorites? Gotta be the Instant Pot. If you've been flirting with getting one of your own but have yet to take the plunge, consider this your sign. After you check out these 66 recipes for the easy-to-use multi-cooker, you'll be wanting your own in a, well, instant. We're not just talking how easy it makes dinnertime, either. We break out the Instant Pot for help with every course, from the first dip into some Instant Pot street corn queso to the last slice of Instant Pot Oreo cheesecake. We won't be surprised if you find you can cook all your meals all week long in an Instant Pot!If you're not sure what Instant Pot is right for you, we tested all the best Instant Pots that are well worth the counter space. In general, Instant Pots do so much more than just pressure cooking and can be used as a rice cooker, slow cooker, steamer yogurt maker, saut√© pan, and a meal warmer.Aside from the tech specs, Instant Pots magically make meals that taste like they simmered all day, like our Instant Pot corned beef or our Instant Pot pot roast, but actually took a fraction of the time. And what's dinner without something sweet at the end? Yup, the Instant Pot can even make dessert, and our Instant Pot banana bread, our Instant Pot brownies, and our Instant Pot cheesecake are proof.Want to save even more time (right now, and in your kitchen)? Check out our favorite Instant Pot appetizers, our best Instant Pot chicken recipes, and our top healthy Instant Pot recipes too.1Instant Pot Corn On The CobAndrew bui If you‚Äôre looking for the most efficient way to cook corn on the cob, the Instant Pot method might take the cake. Serve it while hot with a quick brush of butter and some salt, and you‚Äôve got a classic keeper on your hands.Get the Instant Pot Corn On The Cob recipe. 2Instant Pot RibsParker feierbachEveryone knows that for really good, fall-off-the-bone ribs, you need to cook them low and sloooow. Well, we're throwing that theory out the window! All you need is an Instant Pot and 20 minutes. üò±Get the Instant Pot Ribs recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below3Instant Pot Copycat Bourbon ChickenPHOTO: RACHEL VANNI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONIf you were hanging out in malls in the '90s, you've likely been chased down in the food court to sample this delectable, perfectly sauced chicken thigh recipe on a toothpick. Now you can make this dish at home in your Instant Pot any time you like!Get the Instant Pot Copycat Bourbon Chicken recipe. 4Instant Pot Blackberry-Peach CobblerParker feierbachSummer calls for as many fruit cobblers as possible. There's just one thing: We HATE turning on the oven in the summer. Enter the Instant Pot. No need for extra heat, and the cobbler only needs 15 minutes to cook. Now that's dessert in an instant.Get the Instant Pot Blackberry-Peach Cobbler recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below5Instant Pot Street Corn QuesoParker feierbachEveryone loves a good queso dip, but we might love this Mexican street corn variety even more‚Äîit's got crunch, spice, and tons of cheese as garnish. How could you go wrong?Get the Instant Pot Street Corn Queso recipe.6Instant Pot Chicken Noodle Soup Parker FeierbachIs there anything more comforting than a bowl of chicken noodle soup? This Instant Pot recipe makes light work of this homestyle classic.Get the Instant Pot Chicken Noodle Soup recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below7Instant Pot Pork PuttanescaPHOTO: ERIK BERNSTEIN; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONFor this dish, we were inspired by classic Italian puttanesca, a tomato-based dish with anchovies, capers, and olives that's traditionally served over pasta. Pork makes it extra hearty, so we served it over creamy polenta, but feel free to sub in pasta, rice, or whatever else you can dream up.Get the Instant Pot Pork Puttanesca recipe. 8Instant Pot Shredded Beef NachosPark FeierbachWho doesn't love a big tray of nachos? These are particularly good, considering they're loaded with delicious, tender braised beef chuck roast. If your cut of meat is especially big, you can save the leftovers for tacos‚Äîjust add tortillas!Get the Instant Pot Shredded Beef Nachos recipe.  Advertisement - Continue Reading Below9Instant Pot JambalayaPHOTO: RACHEL VANNI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONThe Instant Pot is a great way to make jambalaya, a Cajun classic, in just an hour. All the rice, veggies, broth, and chicken go in the Instant Pot together and get cooked under high pressure for the perfect, fluffy jambalaya.Get the Instant Pot Jambalaya recipe. 10Instant Pot ChiliParker Feierbach The convenience and speed of the Instant Pot is pretty unparalleled, especially for chili. No more sweating over a hot stove, forever standing and stirring, and standing and stirring...Get the Instant Pot Chili recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below11Instant Pot RisottoParker Feierbach One of our favorite things the Instant Pot can do is make risotto‚Äîit takes all of the arm workout out it! Start with warm broth just as you would with a stovetop version, and you'll have a creamy risotto in no time. Get the Instant Pot Risotto recipe.  12Instant Pot Butter ChickenParker FeierbachOur Instant Pot butter chicken recipe is about to become your favorite weeknight staple that you can now make faster than delivery. Chicken thighs become extremely tender under all the sauce that you'll want to soak up with plenty of naan.Get the Instant Pot Butter Chicken recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below13Instant Pot WingsPark FeierbachThis recipe is the perfect jumping-off point for any of your favorite types of wings. Not a fan of Buffalo sauce? Toss these wings with your favorite barbecue sauce or make a batch of sauce from our Korean fried chicken recipe instead.Get the Instant Pot Wings recipe.14Instant Pot French ToastParker feierbach There's no need for your French toast casserole to take an hour to bake in the oven. You can spend half that time in the Instant Pot for a fuss-free breakfast. It's perfect topped with a little powdered sugar, fruit, and maple syrup.Get the Instant Pot French Toast recipe. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below15Instant Pot Potato SoupPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: MAKINZE GOREThis potato soup is what an Instant Pot was made for‚Äîno need to boil potatoes for a long time or stand over a stove. Throwing everything in the Instant Pot will give you a delicious soup in about 40 minutes flat. üòçGet the Instant Pot Potato Soup recipe.16Meat Lovers' Pizza DipPark FeierbachA pizza-inspired dip is obviously good, but a MEAT LOVERS' pizza dip? That's next-level good. This dip is super simple to make, and everyone will love it. We used sausage, bacon, and pepperoni, but use whatever types of meat you prefer!Get the Meat Lovers' Pizza Dip recipe.  Advertisement - Continue Reading Below17Instant Pot RiceParker FeierbachWhen cooking rice, a lot of things can go wrong. But not in this easy recipe (thanks to the Instant Pot's handy "rice" button!).  Instant Pot, we üíñ  you. Get the Instant Pot Rice recipe.  18Instant Pot PhoLucy schaeffer Ask any seasoned pho-fessional, and they'll tell you that making this Vietnamese beef bone-based soup will take you hours. If you want to try to recreate it without the same time investment, one of the best ways to do this is by using a pressure cooker!Get the Instant Pot Pho recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below19Instant Pot Chicken & RiceParker Feierbach If there's one thing we find magical about Instant Pots, it's how quickly and perfectly they cook chicken and rice. The rice is the perfect texture and the chicken is insanely tender. This is 100% the meal we cook in the Instant Pot the most often.Get the Instant Pot Chicken and Rice recipe.20How To Cook Crab LegsSnow crab legs are one of life's greatest luxuries, but their high price can make preparing them at home feel a little daunting. But we have a secret: Crab legs are ridiculously easy to make (especially in your Instant Pot!).Get the How To Cook Crab Legs recipe. We break out the Instant Pot for help with every course, from the first dip into some \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27243671/instant-pot-queso-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot street corn queso\u003c/a\u003e to the last slice of \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27290363/instant-pot-oreo-cheesecake-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot Oreo cheesecake\u003c/a\u003e. We won't be surprised if you find you can \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/food-news/a40432512/cooking-all-my-meals-in-an-instant-pot/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ecook all your meals all week long in an Instant Pot\u003c/a\u003e!\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eIf you're not sure what Instant Pot is right for you, we tested all the \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/kitchen-tools/g40107996/best-instant-pots/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ebest Instant Pots\u003c/a\u003e that are well worth the counter space. In general, Instant Pots do so much more than just pressure cooking and can be used as a \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/food-news/g40258077/best-rice-cookers/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003erice cooker\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/g3849/best-slow-cooker-recipes/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eslow cooker\u003c/a\u003e, steamer \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27059031/instant-pot-yogurt-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eyogurt maker\u003c/a\u003e, saut√© pan, \u003cem\u003eand\u003c/em\u003e a meal warmer.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eAside from the tech specs, Instant Pots magically make meals that taste like they simmered all day, like our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a26243431/instant-pot-corned-beef-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot corned beef\u003c/a\u003e or our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a25605916/instant-pot-pot-roast-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot pot roast\u003c/a\u003e, but actually took a fraction of the time. And what's dinner without something sweet at the end? Yup, the Instant Pot can even make \u003cem\u003edessert\u003c/em\u003e, and our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27345684/instant-pot-banana-bread-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot banana bread\u003c/a\u003e, our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27336025/instant-pot-brownies-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot brownies\u003c/a\u003e, and our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a57879/instant-pot-cheesecake-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eInstant Pot cheesecake\u003c/a\u003e are proof.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eWant to save even more time (right now, and in your kitchen)? One of our favorites? Gotta be the Instant Pot. If you've been flirting with getting one of your own but have yet to take the plunge, consider this your sign. After you check out these 66 recipes for the easy-to-use multi-cooker, you'll be wanting your own in a, well, instant. We're not just talking how easy it makes dinnertime, either. We break out the Instant Pot for help with every course, from the first dip into some Instant Pot street corn queso to the last slice of Instant Pot Oreo cheesecake. We won't be surprised if you find you can cook all your meals all week long in an Instant Pot!If you're not sure what Instant Pot is right for you, we tested all the best Instant Pots that are well worth the counter space. In general, Instant Pots do so much more than just pressure cooking and can be used as a rice cooker, slow cooker, steamer yogurt maker, saut√© pan, and a meal warmer.Aside from the tech specs, Instant Pots magically make meals that taste like they simmered all day, like our Instant Pot corned beef or our Instant Pot pot roast, but actually took a fraction of the time. And what's dinner without something sweet at the end? Yup, the Instant Pot can even make dessert, and our Instant Pot banana bread, our Instant Pot brownies, and our Instant Pot cheesecake are proof.Want to save even more time (right now, and in your kitchen)?
